title: Implement basic index in Python
description: Implement index.py: scan_issues_directory(), build_by_id_map(). Simple in-memory dict, no caching yet.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: implement basic index building in Python. Acceptance: IssueIndex with by_id/by_status/by_type/by_parent/by_label/reverse_dependencies and build_index_from_directory with tests matching index_building.feature.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Implemented python index module + tests. Ran: cd python && pytest
